tool_description: APIs to manipulate HLS or DASH ABR feeds for Dynamic Ad Insertion, Content Replacement and VOD2Live.
name: broadpeak.io
title: broadpeak.io

api_list.name: AssetsController_create
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://broadpeak-io.p.rapidapi.com/v1/sources/asset"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "broadpeak-io.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
